definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It takes away our edge, makes us groggy, and disrupts our sleep.
sentences.chinese: 它讓我們反應遲鈍，頭昏腦脹，擾亂我們的睡眠。

sentences.english: Look at my schedule make my head spin.
sentences.chinese: 看日程表就使我頭昏腦脹。

sentences.english: The very idea sets my head reeling .
sentences.chinese: 就是那念頭把我弄得頭昏腦脹。

sentences.english: I'm going from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 在地方之間周循使我頭昏腦脹。

sentences.english: Awareness alone an important figure in the head on the exchange, incomprehensible.
sentences.chinese: 光是認識重要人物，就寒暄得頭昏腦脹，不知所云。

sentences.english: Even if he was disorientated then, he should apologize for his behaviour NOW.
sentences.chinese: 即使他頭昏腦脹，那麼現在他也該向她道歉了。

sentences.english: The condensation shorts the circuits to your brain, and you get all woozy.
sentences.chinese: 溼氣凝結導致大腦短路，你開始頭昏腦脹。

sentences.english: Even the coconut trees seemed swollen and expectant.
sentences.chinese: 連椰子樹都似乎憋得頭昏腦脹，巴望能舒上一口氣。

sentences.english: Lack of sleep had fogged her mind.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏睡眠使她頭昏腦脹。

sentences.english: The people here seem to be used to the dizzy noise.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的人們似乎都習慣於令人頭昏腦脹的噪音。

sentences.english: A great number of math exercises make my head swim.
sentences.chinese: 大量的數學作業搞得我頭昏腦脹。

definition: yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
impotence/also written 陽痿|阳痿[yang2 wei3]
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
